intro: Costus anachiri, commonly known as the slender costus, is a herbaceous plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the Zingiberaceae family, which includes gingers and related plants. The plant features narrow, grass-like leaves and produces spikes of small, white or pale yellow flowers. It is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forest understories. The rhizomes of Costus anachiri are sometimes used in traditional medicine for their purported health benefits.
